title: Did Cory Feldman have challenged Bidovelia's claims?
subtitle: The representative (Kore Feldman) stated that he had been stabbed for his allegations that he had been a victim of child sexual harassment, but that police statements did not support his account.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Corrie Feldman was stabbed by attackers who were angry at his allegations that he was a victim of paedophilia.
